info.description: This is the new wildfitter api

get.description: Search through activities.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Filter activity created BEFORE that date. Received as timestamp.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Filter activity created AFTER that date. Received as timestamp.

parameters.name: groups
parameters.description: Filter on activity group (separated by commas).

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: Filter on activity type (create/update/delete).

parameters.name: is-triage
parameters.description: Filter activities for admin triage. Will return only activities that require mandatory admin inspection.

parameters.name: profile
parameters.description: Only include activities performed on this profile

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Only include activities performed by this profile

parameters.name: outfitter
parameters.description: Include activities related to this outfitter

parameters.name: brand
parameters.description: Include activities related to this brand

parameters.name: association
parameters.description: Include activities related to this association

parameters.name: vendor
parameters.description: Include activities related to this generic vendor

parameters.name: review
parameters.description: Only Include activities related to this review

parameters.name: verification
parameters.description: Only include activities regarding this Profile Verification

parameters.name: album
parameters.description: Include activities related to this album

get.description: Get a single activity. Only Lambda apps with admin token can access.

parameters.name: activityId
parameters.description: Id of the activity to retreive

get.description: Search brands with advanced filters reserved to admins. The only public filters are `q` and `profile-status`. Sort order is ignored when the `q` parameter is set, and instead results are sorted by match relevance

parameters.name: profile-status
parameters.description: The status of the profile (online/offline/any) (online by default)

parameters.name: deleted
parameters.description: Include soft deleted profiles in the search (yes/no/any) (no by default)

parameters.name: location
parameters.description:
Filter by country or state. The Geoname ID of the GeoEntities separated by commas, or '0' to filter those without a location.
Also those values are possible 'midwest', 'south', 'east', 'west'

get.description: Get all the brand programs statistics.

parameters.name: brandId
parameters.description: Id of the brand

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Year to fetch stats for. If ommited it'll use current year

200.description: Three objects with yearly, weekly, and daily statistics

yearly.description:
Get all the brand programs statistics.
3 objects in the response:
- "today" contains the latest stats
- "monthly" contains the monthly stats for the last 12 months
- "daily" contains the daily stats for the last 6 months


Mapping for keys:
- m > members
- mn > members_new
- v > visits
- s > shopping
- r > revenue
- g > gross
- c > comsn
- o > nborders

monthly.description:
Get all the brand programs statistics.
3 objects in the response:
- "today" contains the latest stats
- "monthly" contains the monthly stats for the last 12 months
- "daily" contains the daily stats for the last 6 months

- m > members
- mn > members_new
- v > visits
- s > shopping
- r > revenue
- g > gross
- c > comsn
- o > nborders

daily.description:
Get all the brand programs statistics.
3 objects in the response:
- "today" contains the latest stats

get.description: Search discount codes.For managers, the `brand` parameter is mandatory. For insiders, the `program` parameter (gop, idp, ...etc) is mandatory.

parameters.name: brand
parameters.description: The brand ID (required for managers)

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: To filter the codes that the user can use (the ones assigned to him and the ones not assigned to anyone)

parameters.name: gop
parameters.description: The GOP ID for which the code is valid (required for Pros)

parameters.name: idp
parameters.description: The IDP ID for which the code is valid (required for Brand Employees)

parameters.name: cnp
parameters.description: The CNP ID for which the code is valid (required for NGO Employees)

parameters.name: oep
parameters.description: The OEP ID for which the code is valid (required for Government Employees)

parameters.name: mip
parameters.description: The MIP ID for which the code is valid (required for Military)

parameters.name: frp
parameters.description: The FRP ID for which the code is valid (required for First Responders)

parameters.name: ecp
parameters.description: The ECP ID for which the code is valid (required for Educators)

parameters.name: rtp
parameters.description: The RTP ID for which the code is valid (required for Retail Employees)

parameters.name: dealer
parameters.description: Vendor ID. Filter discount codes that have been checked or used at that dealer

post.description:
For admins and brand managers: create a discount code. Examples:
* - To create a global code for all shops/programs: {'code': 'XXXXX'}
* - To create a global code for Zeiss GOP: {'code': 'XXXXX', 'brand': 6, 'gop': 6}
* - To create a personal code for a Zeiss Pro member: {'code': 'XXXXX', 'brand': 6, 'gop': 6, 'user': 1234}
*

owner.description: The profile ID of the brand this code belongs to (required if not admin)

code.description: The discount code itself (will be trimmed) (max 100 chars)

description.description: A small description of what the code gives (max 150 chars)

expiration_date.description: The date when the code will automatically expire

use_date.description: The date when the code was used

brand.description: The ID of the brand this code applies to

gop.description: The ID of the GOP this code applies to. Means members of brand's GOP can then use that code.

idp.description: The ID of the IDP this code applies to. Means members of brand's IDP can then use that code.

frp.description: The ID of the FRP this code applies to. Means members of brand's FRP can then use that code.

oep.description: The ID of the EOP this code applies to. Means members of brand's EOP can then use that code.

cnp.description: The ID of the CNP this code applies to. Means members of brand's CNP can then use that code.

ecp.description: The ID of the ECP this code applies to. Means members of brand's ECP can then use that code.

rtp.description: The ID of the RTP this code applies to. Means members of brand's RTP can then use that code.

mip.description: The ID of the MIP this code applies to. Means members of brand's MIP can then use that code.

with.description: The extra fields you want in the returned JSON

Sort criterias:
- 'new': by upload date, recent to old
- 'old': by upload date, old to recent
- 'pos-desc': by album position, top to bottom
- 'pos-asc': by album position, bottom to top

PAGINATION:
Pivot pagination, i.e. not using a page number but an attribute of the last item of a page to get the next page. Use the "next" path from meta
